author: Staff Reporter
text:
Complaint was sent to Child Welfare Committee

A 16-year-old girl was sexually abused by a 46-year-old sweeper of Pavendar Bharathidasan Government High School here.

On March 18, Childline had forwarded a complaint to Child Welfare Committee (CWC) regarding the abuse of a minor girl. A well-wisher informed that she and a few other girls were abused by the sweeper. Then, the minor girl was produced before the CWC along with her parents and a complaint was filed. Subsequently, an FIR was registered by Thirubhuvanai police.

The victim was studying in class XI at the school. “Two weeks ago, the girl arrived early to school when the sweeper was cleaning a classroom. He called her inside and sexually abused her,” said a CWC employee. A case under Section 10 of the Prevention of Children from Sexual Offences Act was filed and the accused arrested.
title: Girl sexually abused by school sweeper
